denis honda malala kridakaya redimole awurudu uthsawe marathan eka denis innakan hama awuruddema dinuwa.ohuge samakalinayo wune es el bi rosa mejar wimaladasa wage dura duwapu kridakayanuyi.denis kohomahari nikan rasthiyadu gahamin hitapu apiwath kridawata sambandha karagaththa hamadama hawasata naranwaththe pittaniyata api kattiyawa ekkan gihin eksayis karanna patangaththa, ohoma tika dawasakin api samagi krida samajaya aarambha kala.eeta passe pradeshiya upa disapathi kottasha mattame tharangawalata giya,ee kale kiwwe di aar oo mit kiyalayi.malala krida tharanga balanna apith ekka kolambaa giya.oya aakarayata denisgen kridawa igena ganipu podi un ada honda krida upadeshakayan wela inne denista pin siddawennayi.kridawa karaddi mathpan bonna dum bonna honda na kiyala okkolama ee waradi purudu atha arala damma,nomanga yamin hitapu kollo ralak harimagata aragena gamata ratata wadak athi manussayo karanna denis kale kawadawath demawpiyanta karanna bari rajakariyakuyi.
